competitors.name: Cadence Design Systems
competitors.notes: Primary competitor with approximately 30% market share, offering end-to-end EDA software platform

competitors.name: Siemens EDA
competitors.notes: Formerly Mentor Graphics (acquired by Siemens in 2017), holds approximately 13% market share

context: Synopsys, Inc. is a electronic design automation company focused on chip design software, IP, and software security. AI chip design tools. Record semiconductor designs.
